response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you, which we believe is an excellent investment. This product holds significant value for us, and we are excited about the opportunity to share it with someone like you. We are offering this exceptional product to you for $1,500,000. This price reflects not only its market value but also the unique benefits and features it offers. We are confident that you will find it to be a worthwhile addition to your collection or business. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 1500000}
